author: Yong Pung How CJ:
casename: Public Prosecutor v Kang Seong Yong
counsel: Christopher Ong Siu Jin (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the appellant; K Mathialahan (Guna and Associates) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Appeals/Conviction of immigration offence involving making of false statement to obtain employment pass/Appeal by Public Prosecutor against sentence imposed on offender/Whether judge below justified in finding exceptional circumstances warranting departure from sentencing norm

Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Conviction of immigration offence involving making of false statement to obtain employment pass/Appropriate sentence to be imposed/Factors to consider/Sections 57(1)(k), 57(1)(iv) Immigration Act (Cap 133, 1997 Rev Ed)
